original_text: The same day Sadducees came to him, who say that there is no resurrection, and they asked him a question,
korean_text: 부활이 없다 하는 사두개인들이 그 날 예수께 와서 물어 이르되

sentences.original_text: The same day Sadducees came to him
who say that there is no resurrection
and they asked him a question
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 한 가지 질문을 했더라
